original_title: Decision on re-holding Grade 5 Scholarship exam after probing ‘paper leak’
original_body_lines: The Education Ministry says the decision on whether to hold the Grade 5 Scholarship Examination again or not will be made after the CID and the Exams Department complete their investigations into the alleged leaking of questions.
The decision will be based on the findings and recommendations of the relevant investigations, according to the Secretary to the Ministry of Education.
